Welcome to Python OC Lettings FR's documentation!
=================================================

   Python OC Lettings FR is an application developed for Orange County Lettings
   whose objective is the visualization of customers and rental properties.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   Project description <project_desc>
   Installing the app <install_app>
   Quick Start <quick_start>
   Requirements <requirements>
   Database <database>
   Description of the API <desc_api_menu>
   User guide and user cases <user_cases_menu>
   CI/CD Pipeline <cicd_menu>
